txt.en:
'You have done enough for the day, my friend. More than enough! Now it is time to take up your seat as an honoured guest of the Caru-lûth.

'Our annual festival is almost upon us. I hope it will not be so bad as the impetuous young fawns have led you to believe... ha!

'Speak with me again when you are ready.'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'I fear for what may have taken place in the herd-lands after that crow returned last night. A farmer lives there with his son, and a farmhand as well. I must ponder what to do....'
'Are you ready for the festival? Come, [placeholder] -- to me, you are an honoured friend and guest.'
The Feast of the Running Stag
The time is nigh for the annual Feast of the Running Stag. You have been asked to be present for the rites as an honoured guest of Lhan Tarren.
Talk to Riagán to attend the Feast of the Running Stag
You should speak with Elder Riagán in Lhan Tarren.\n\nThe Elder of the Stag-clan has looked forward to inviting you to the festival.
Elder Riagán is in Lhan Tarren.\n\nYou should speak with Elder Riagán.
